text: 🚨🔒😷💉  💉💉💉Folks, it's time to take a stand against the globalist elites and their attempts to control our lives through fear and manipulation. The Covid-19 pandemic is being used as a pretext for unprecedented government overreach, and it's up to us to push back and protect our freedoms.First and foremost, let's not be fooled by the mainstream media's fearmongering. The vast majority of Covid-19 cases are mild or asymptomatic, and the survival rate is higher than 99%. We don't need to live in fear of a virus with a mortality rate lower than the flu.That being said, it's important to take common-sense precautions to protect ourselves and our loved ones.
